籤詩版本二:
ʻAʻohe mea e hopohopo ai no ka maʻi a me ka hoʻopiʻi ʻana, aia ka ʻāina waiwai a me ka waiwai.
E like me ka wehe ʻana o ka ʻape mai kona mau kaulahao a hoʻi i ke ana e ʻauwana ai
詩意:
Hōʻike kēia hexagram i ke kiʻi o kahi ape i hoʻokuʻu ʻia mai kona mau kaulahao.
Paʻakikī nā mea a pau ma mua o ka maʻalahi ma hope.
解曰: E hoʻopau i nā mea. A noho mālie. E hele mai i ka manawa kūpono. E huli i ke ala pololei.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Hui ʻo Xiangzi me kahi malihini (Han Xiangzi hui me Lu Dongbin)
I ka moʻopuna Tang, ʻo Han Xiangzi ka moʻopuna a Han Yu. He ʻano ʻino kona a ʻaʻole maikaʻi i ke aʻo ʻana, no laila ʻaʻohe ona koho ma mua o ka inu ʻana. Ua kāhea ʻia ʻo ia e Han Yu e aʻo i ke kula, akā ma kahi o ke aʻo maikaʻi ʻana, ua hoʻoweliweli ʻo ia i kāna mau hoa papa. Ma hope mai, ua hoʻonohonoho ʻo Han Yu iā ia e aʻo i loko o kahi monastery, akā ua hoʻopiʻi ka ʻAbbot o ka monastery i kona haʻaheo.
Ma hope mai, hele mai ʻo Lu Dongbin e hoʻomālamalama iā ia, a lilo ʻo ia i mea make ʻole. Kapa ʻia ʻo Emperor Yaohua. ʻO kekahi o nā mea make ʻewalu. ʻO kona hōʻailona he hīnaʻi pua paʻa lima.
聖意: Ua pilikia au ma ka home, pule au no ka waiwai a me ka pomaikai, ke kali nei ke kuai ana, aole i pau ka mare ana, pule o Liujia i na hele wawae e hele i ke kula, nui na enuhe silika, loaa na holoholona liu, loaa na kanaka. , pono ka hoopii, mamao loa ka waiwai i nalowale, laki ka mai, maikai ka lua kupapau.
古人: Hui ʻo Xiangzi me kahi malihini (Han Xiangzi hui me Lu Dongbin)
第X籤: He kanakolukumamāono lanakila ma ka hailona
